TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_truwan, title = truwan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/truwan} }

S.FORM: alang truwan ga niya mki sku Nanto Keng atu Nin'ay go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 60 buwan, 167 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 97% kyan ku 162 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 3% kyan ku 5 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Setik 81%, Tayan 11%, Bunun 4%,binah lihuyan s'uli 1%. maki qu ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na truwan hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay 'zil na truwan hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkyahu' na truwan hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkraya' na truwan hya' ga llyung. tay 'llaw na truwan hya' ga sadu. tay 'zil na truwan hya' ga ruku daya. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang trowan ga niya mki sko Nanto Keng ato Nin'ay go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 60 bowan, 167 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 97% kyan ko 162 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 3% kyan ko 5 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Setik 81%, Tayan 11%, Bonon 4%,binah lihoyan s'oli 1%. maki qo ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na trowan hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay 'zil na trowan hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkyaho' na trowan hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkraya' na trowan hya' ga llyong. tay 'llaw na trowan hya' ga sado. tay 'zil na trowan hya' ga roko daya. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
